ERFormatComponentPropertyBinding.ExpressionAsString: AND( IF(model.PrintMgmtSetting.PrintTotalsInEuro = modelEnumNoYes.Yes, true, false), model.InvoiceBase.CurrencyCode <> model.InvoiceBase.CurrencyCodeEuro )

IF(model.InvoiceBase.'$Tax02TransExist', IF( AND( model.InvoiceBase.'$Tax05TotalsByCode'.aggregated.BaseAmountCompCurr = 0, model.InvoiceBase.'$Tax05TotalsByCode'.aggregated.BaseAmountInvCurr = 0, model.InvoiceBase.'$Tax05TotalsByCode'.aggregated.TaxAmountCompCurr = 0, model.InvoiceBase.'$Tax05TotalsByCode'.aggregated.TaxAmountInvCurr = 0 ), false, true ), false )

ERExpressionBooleanHost.ExpressionAsString: IF( AND( model.PrintMgmtSetting.PrintPaymentAttachment = modelPaymentAttachment.Finnish, NOT(model.'$NoLines'), COUNT(model.InvoiceBase.CompanyInfo.BankAccountGiro)=0 ), false, true )
IF( AND( model.PrintMgmtSetting.PrintPaymentAttachment = modelPaymentAttachment.Finnish, NOT(model.'$NoLines'), '#Giro_FI'.OcrLine = "" ), false, true )
